articles.title: Tesla Stock Nears $500 for the First Time. How It Gets There.

articles.summary: Barrons.com: Tesla Stock Nears $500 for the First Time. How It Gets There.. Tesla CEO Elon Musk said on X that Teslaâ€™s robo-taxis were unaffected. Tesla stock traded above $490 early Tuesday, but slid back to $488.08, down 0.1%, while the was up 0.1% and the was down 0.1%. Coming into Tuesday trading, Tesla stock was up 21% this year, boosted by a 25% jump over the past month, despite falling EV sales. Related tickers mentioned: ARKK, TSLA, ^DJI, ^GSPC.
